name: Precious Pineapple Cake
author: Linda
summary: This wonderful cake starts with a cake mix to which you add pineapple and pecans. It is very moist, even better the second day.
ingredients: 1 (20 ounce) can crushed pineapple with juice
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease and flour 3 - 8  inch round pans
In a large bowl cream 1/2 cup margarine until smooth
Add the cake mix and crushed pineapple with juice and mix until smooth
Stir in the 1/2 cup chopped pecans
Bake in the preheated oven for 20 to 30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the centers of the cakes comes out clean
To make the frosting: In a medium bowl cream 1/2 cup softened margarine and the cream cheese until smooth
Gradually blend in the confectioners' sugar and 1/2 cup chopped pecans
